title: Fairmont Luxury on the California Coast: Daily Breakfast & Kids Stay Free
description: Experience California in style at the renowned Fairmont Grand Del Mar, one of the top-rated luxury hotels in the United States. Luxury abounds at this grand resort, home to Southern California's only Five-Star/Five-Diamond restaurant, a world-championship golf course and one of the world's elite five-star day spas - all set within the picturesque Californian coastline with easy access to downtown San Diego and a climate of year-round sunshine. Your stay includes freshly cooked à la carte breakfast daily, resort fees, late checkout until 1pm and 20% discount on golf and spa treatments.
offer_address: 5300 Grand Del Mar Ct, San Diego, CA 92130, USA

title: Stylish Downtown San Diego Escape in Gaslamp Quarter with Daily Resort Credit & Rooftop Pool
description:
Step into the music-inspired oasis of this Hard Rock sanctuary in San Diego's downtown Gaslamp Quarter. Expect nothing less than world-class hospitality and epic musical amenities as you retreat to the rock 'n' roll-inspired pads, complete with signature Sleep Like a Rock luxury bedding and Sound of Your Stay® perks.

Spend your days lounging in the poolside cabanas, sway along to live music on the outdoor terrace, sip on cocktails at FLOAT Rooftop Bar & Lounge or discover new threads at the onsite Rock Shop® - there is plenty to keep the musically curious engaged.

Sample nouveau Japanese cuisine at Nobu San Diego, the renowned outpost of celebrity chef Nobu Matsuhisa, or head to Maryjane's Diner to tuck into hearty Southwestern food before a tipple at the 207 Bar. When it's time to explore, you're just moments from the hip shops, restaurants and bars of Gaslamp Arch, the Balboa Theatre and San Diego Zoo.
offer_address: 207 Fifth Avenue, San Diego, California 92101, United States

title: Sun-Soaked Sheraton San Diego City Break with US$100 Resort Credit & Waived Resort Fees
description: Embrace the excitement of making memories to last a lifetime while basking in the warmth of the California sun with a stay at Sheraton San Diego Hotel & Marina, overlooking the city’s stunning waterfront. Just five minutes from the airport, this impressive, nautical-themed hotel is the perfect base to explore the city’s endless charms, whether it’s San Diego’s sensational surf or the city’s dazzling collection of world-class attractions. After days spent at San Diego Zoo or the Gaslamp Quarter, return for pub-style plates and craft beers at Quinn’s Ale House, sophisticated cocktails at the Shoreline Cantina or laze the afternoon away by the resort’s shimmering, oasis-like outdoor pool.
offer_address: 1380 Harbor Island Dr San Diego CA 92101 United States

title: Coastal California Beachfront Luxury near San Diego with Ocean-View Pool
description: Sun-kissed relaxation and upscale beachside living - experience the Californian lifestyle with a stay at L'Auberge Del Mar, a coastal oasis just 20 minutes from San Diego. Inhale the sea breeze from the ocean-view pool, kick back in a cabana with a refreshing frosé or indulge in refined dining and sweeping vistas at Adelaide restaurant. When you're ready to explore, follow the resort's private trail to golden shores or hop on a complimentary beach cruiser and take a spin through the local village, with its string of trendy boutiques and eateries. To really get away from it all, hit the trail and explore Del Mar's myriad scenic hiking trails.
offer_address: 1540 Camino Del Mar, Del Mar, CA 92014, United States

title: Relaxed Bayside California Retreat next to SeaWorld San Diego
description: Indulge in Southern California beachside glamour in the fun-filled Paradise Point Resort & Spa, the closest resort to the iconic SeaWorld San Diego. You'll find everything you could want for a fun-filled family holiday here, with five swimming pools, a tranquil spa, delicious coastal cuisine, and plenty of island recreation options for you to explore. Venture out for a dip in the resort's private lake or nearby beaches, or discover San Diego's top attractions within walking distance.

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo San Diego Del Mar
title: Boutique San Diego Coastal Escape with Ocean Views
description: Experience the coastal charm of Southern California with a stay at Hotel Indigo San Diego Del Mar, an IHG Hotel. This boutique retreat offers a refreshing blend of beachside relaxation and vibrant city life. Spend your days strolling along the pristine beaches, or indulging in the regions fresh seafood at local eateries. Back at the hotel, unwind in the tranquil Spa NA’MARA, take a dip in the pool, or enjoy a cocktail at the Ocean View Bar & Grill while gazing out at the coastal landscape.
location_description: Hotel Indigo San Diego Del Mar, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 710 Camino Del Mar, Del Mar, CA 92014 United States

title: Stylish Downtown San Diego Stay Three Eateries, Pool & Private Skybridge to Petco Park
description:
Perfectly situated in the heart of the city's historic Gaslamp Quarter, this contemporary retreat offers a gateway to San Diego's unique culture, history and nightlife.

Savour sumptuous Baja Californian cuisine at Tortuga restaurant, enjoy a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool or retreat to your elegantly appointed room with stunning views. When you're ready to explore, find yourself steps from the bustling Seaport Village and Petco Park, home of the San Diego Padres and connected to the hotel via a private skybridge.
offer_address: 675 L Street, San Diego, California 92101, USA

title: Waterfront San Diego Glamour Overlooking the Harbour with Rooftop Pool & Three Onsite Restaurants
description: Bask in the coastal elegance of InterContinental San Diego, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's vibrant downtown district. Overlooking the sparkling harbour and bay, this sophisticated waterfront retreat offers easy access to the historic Gaslamp Quarter, brimming with eclectic dining, shopping and entertainment. Indulge in fresh seafood at the hotel's Vistal Bar + Restaurant, enjoy a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool or explore the city's renowned craft beer scene.
location_description: InterContinental San Diego, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 901 Bayfront Court, San Diego, California 92101, United States

title: Palatial San Diego Coastal Charm with Michelin-Starred Dining, Golf Course & Four Pools
description:
Surrounded by lush landscapes and Mediterranean-inspired architecture, the five-star Fairmont Grand Del Mar is an oasis of luxury, featuring a world-class spa, an award-winning golf course and four pools. Enjoy Michelin-starred dining at Addison Restaurant and laid-back Italian fare at Cent' Anni Café.

Tucked away in the rolling hills of Northern San Diego, you're a short hop from sweeping coastline views at La Jolla, the raw wilderness of Torrey Pines State Natural Reserve and the historic Old Town San Diego. Imbued with charm and elegance, Fairmont Grand Del Mar sits cradled among the undulating hills of the Carmel Valley.
offer_address: 5300 Grand Del Mar Court, San Diego, California, 92130, United States

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo San Diego Gaslamp Quarter
title: Urban-Chic San Diego Downtown City Break near Petco Park with Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
description: Stay among the action and discover the East Village's thriving arts and brewpub scene at uber-cool Hotel Indigo San Diego - Gaslamp Quarter, an IHG Hotel. Ideally placed in one of the city's hippest neighbourhoods, you'll be close to San Diego's best nightlife, eclectic eateries, boutiques and museums. After a day exploring this diverse city or catching a Padres game at Petco Park, retreat to the hotel's rooftop terrace for panoramic city views and handcrafted cocktails.
location_description: Hotel Indigo San Diego - Gaslamp Quarter, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 509 9th Avenue, San Diego, California, 92101, United States

title: Light-Filled San Diego City Break near Gaslamp District & Little Italy
description: Perfectly positioned between the historic Gaslamp District and celebrated Little Italy, Kimpton Alma San Diego, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect chance to discover the city’s uniquely Southern Californian soul. After days spent exploring the city, hit Desmond’s for intimate plates showcasing San Diego's spectacular regional produce or wander into Leave of Absence for handcrafted cocktails, wood-fired pizzas and house-made ice cream.
offer_address: 1047 Fifth Avenue, San Diego, California 92101, United States
